meanings.definition: Extremely rarefied or refined to an extreme degree.
meanings.sent1: The ultrararefied diamond sparkled in the sunlight.
meanings.sent2: The ultrararefied painting was displayed in a prestigious art gallery.
meanings.sent3: Finding a unicorn is as ultrararefied as winning the lottery.
meanings.sent4: Her ultrararefied talent shone brighter than any star in the sky.
meanings.sent5: The ultrararefied flower bloomed once in a lifetime, captivating all who saw it.

meanings.definition: Of the highest or most exclusive quality or status.
meanings.sent1: The ultrararefied champagne was served only at royal banquets.
meanings.sent2: She wore an ultrararefied gown that turned heads wherever she went.
meanings.sent3: His ultrararefied collection of vintage cars made his friends envious.
meanings.sent4: The ultrararefied sunset painted the sky in hues never seen before.
meanings.sent5: In the ultrararefied world of haute couture, only the best designers succeed.
